title: What are the techniques used in Quantum Psi for emotional healing and communication?
first_phrase: In the last part of this text, the author introduces several techniques related to Quantum Psi and hypnomentalism. One such technique is the use of the crystal (chiaroveggenza) for opening perception. Another technique is the cognitive approach for processing grief, where one can enter into the perspective of the dying person and identify their desires for the living. The author also presents techniques for communication with varying levels of depth, such as the multi-level communication utilizing emotional and mental openness. Additionally, the concept of Polyvagal theory is discussed, which highlights the importance of connection and context in working with people. Within this framework, the author explains the use of the spiegel method and oculomotor blockage to increase receptivity. Finally, the author compares PNL and Quantum Psi and elucidates the conceptual framework for their teachings.
